name: Pesky Pangolin
description:
HOW THE HECK TO PLAY?:

wasd:  movement
spacebar DOWN: start rolling
spaccebar UP: jump

Jam Version Issues (some will get fixed post-jam):

There is no win state, lots of sounds missing, mute button doesn't work?, UI never got refreshed, some lighting issues, could have used another art pass. 

I also want to add a speedrun timer too.
